name: Lil' Locksmith
description:
Made for the My First Game Jam: Winter 2021

This is my first Game Jam game AND one of the first games I've ever made!

- Lil Locksmith - 

You're a Little Locksmith whos job is to go inside locks and move around the pins to unlock the path to the key! (There might also be some secrets idk)

- Controls - 

Arrow Keys - Movement

W and S - Move the Pins

Thank you for playing and Have Fun!
